text.text_translated:
Mythology is a name for old the Greek stories.  
One story is Theseus and the Minotaur.  
In the story Crete ruled Athens.  
The Athenians fought back against the king.  
As punishment, the king made Athens send seven boys.  
He also made them send seven girls each year.  
The youths went into a labyrinth.  
A labyrinth is a big maze.  
A monster called the Minotaur lived in the labyrinth.  
The Minotaur ate the youths.  
Theseus was a brave young man.  
He fought the Minotaur and killed it.  
Suzanne Collins liked this myth a lot.  
She saw Katniss Everdeen as a futuristic Theseus.  
The myth gave her an important idea for The Hunger Games.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Mythology is a set of old Greek stories.  
A labyrinth is a big maze.  
The story of Theseus and the Minotaur is about Athens.  
Crete ruled over Athens.  
The Athenians rebelled.  
Because they rebelled, the king of Crete punished them.  
He made Athens send seven boys and seven girls each year.  
He sent them into a labyrinth.  
A monster called the Minotaur lived in the labyrinth.  
The monster ate the youths.  
Theseus was a brave young man.  
He fought the Minotaur.  
He killed the monster.  
Suzanne Collins liked this old Greek story.  
It was an important inspiration for The Hunger Games.  
She sees Katniss Everdeen as a future Theseus.
